content: By: Duane Brown July 26, 2023 Use Google Ads AI & Machine Learning To Run Better Campaigns Paid Search Marketing (PPC) | Online Advertising | AI and SEO Discover how to maximize the potential of Google Ads through AI and machine learning in this article. Learn how to prioritize your ecommerce data, leverage 1st party data, optimize product images, titles, and descriptions, and build a comprehensive shopping feed. Discover the benefits of Google Merchant Center's automatic improvements to ensure up-to-date and high-quality data. Read this post By: Megan Morreale November 17, 2020 The New Best Practices for Native Advertising on Editorial Sites Online Advertising | Marketing Psychology | Marketing Industry How and when we interact with ads online drastically changed in March when COVID-19 ushered in a new era of rolling global lockdowns, not to mention lifestyle changes that none of us could predict. People started interacting with content from different devices, at different times, and reacting to different types of campaign creatives. All of this resulted in a new set of best practices for marketers to follow when it comes to running effective native ads. Read this post By: Simon Penson January 16, 2017 Programmatic Delivery: The Future of Content Marketing and Promotion? Content Marketing | Online Advertising | Public Relations Could programmatic delivery be the answer to the challenges of content distribution and promotion in the future? Simon Penson thinks so. Read on to discover how this new method of paid content delivery could help you. Read this post By: Daniel Marks June 21, 2016 Context is King: A Million Examples of Creative Ad Campaigns Getting it Right Content Marketing | Online Advertising We all know the familiar mantra, but when it comes to digital advertising, it's the *context* of your content that leads the monarchy. Are you capitalizing on different contextual opportunities in your marketing campaigns? Read this post By: Kenia Gonzalez April 13, 2016 Facebook vs Youtube: Which Side of the Video Battle Should You Join? Online Advertising | Video Deciding which platforms to invest your video marketing has been yet another hurdle to overcome with the rising competition between Facebook and YouTube. The folks at Wolfgang Digital share the findings of their study to determine where your videos will get the most bang for your buck. Read this post By: Celine Mirzaian April 12, 2016 How to Bring Life to Your Brand with Facebook Canvas Social Media | Online Advertising Facebook's new Canvas ad platform is worth a look for brands looking to up engagement on the social network. Read this post By: Rebecca Maynes February 24, 2016 Does Ad Viewability Always Equal Views? Online Advertising Ad viewability is only becoming more and more important, with Google announcing it would only charge advertisers for viewable impressions. But what exactly does "viewable" mean, and does it translate to actual views? Mediative recently conducted a research study that set out to answer these questions. Read this post By: Will Critchlow February 8, 2016 A Checklist for Native Advertising: How to Comply with the FTC’s New Rules Online Advertising With fairly stringent guidelines and potential technical complications, the FTC's updated rules on what constitutes a misleading native advert could be a game-changer. Anyone dealing in native online advertising should pay close attention to make sure they're adhering to the new best practices. Read this post By: Ciaran Murphy December 16, 2015 The Day Remarketing Changed Forever Online Advertising | Marketing Industry On June 25th, 2015, AdWords changed forever when Google announced that remarketing audiences would become available for advertisers on search. In this video blog, Ciaran Murphy goes over what this means and why it's important. Read this post By: David Chapman December 9, 2015 The Ultimate Guide to Finding Opportunities in Adwords Paid Search Marketing (PPC) | Online Advertising Looking for ways to optimize your Adwords accounts? This post contains enough tips to keep your busy for months. Read this post By: Larry Kim December 2, 2015 The Ridiculously Smart Guide to Buying Legit Twitter Followers Social Media | Online Advertising | Paid Search Marketing (PPC) Don't give in to the temptation of paying for bogus followers. For the same amount and with a little ingenuity, you could buy real Twitter fans with Followers Campaigns — and get a few other bonuses out of the deal, too! Because of the heavy rush and frequent purchases, they have to update their feeds and submit to Merchant Center on a real-time basis. Sometimes this makes them inefficient in displaying the latest status of product ads.Google announced an enhancement earlier this year, via the online pr...
